flavor_text_entries.black:
Ill tempered, it fights by swinging its
barbed tail around wildly. The leaf
growing on its head is very bitter.
flavor_text_entries.white:
It attacks enemies with strikes
of its thorn-covered tail.
This Pokémon is wild tempered.
flavor_text_entries.black-2:
It strikes its enemies with
a thorn-covered tail.
The leaf on its head is bitter.
